title: silver III mid/supp looking for team
body:
just finished this semester and have a decent amount of time on my hands 
im 19 just looking to have some fun in a team nothing too serious
champ pools
Mid - Anivia, Fizz, Azir, jayce, kat, zed, ori, syndra, xerath
supp- thresh, blitz, braum, nami, janna, morg

replies.body: not my style of support, i dabbled in annie support but found her underwhelming and as for mid she gets dumped on with anyone that isn't melee
l2p vel koz support. and brand support. and why no annie in mid and support?
